item_0.title: Mobile-First Product Browsing and Search
item_0.description: Customers browse and search for products using a mobile-first interface with responsive design and AI-powered recommendations. The system provides fast loading times, robust filtering options, and personalized product suggestions based on user behavior and preferences.

main_flow.item_1: System displays homepage optimized for mobile viewing
main_flow.item_2: Customer uses search bar or navigates through categories
main_flow.item_3: System returns relevant products with filtering options
main_flow.item_5: Customer selects a product to view details

alternate_flows.item_0: Customer applies filters to refine search results
alternate_flows.item_1: Customer sorts products by price, rating, or popularity
alternate_flows.item_2: Customer views product recommendations without logging in

postconditions.item_0: Customer views product details or search results
postconditions.item_1: System logs browsing behavior for personalization

item_0.business_value: Addresses mobile-first commerce trend and improves user engagement through personalization, directly impacting conversion rates and customer satisfaction

item_1.title: Guest Checkout with Multiple Payment Options
item_1.description: Customers can complete purchases without creating an account using a streamlined checkout process that supports multiple secure payment gateways. The system ensures PCI DSS compliance and provides transparent pricing information.

preconditions.item_0: Customer has added items to cart
preconditions.item_1: Payment gateways are configured and active
preconditions.item_2: Inventory is available for selected items

main_flow.item_3: System displays transparent pricing including taxes and shipping
main_flow.item_7: Order confirmation is generated and sent to customer

alternate_flows.item_0: Customer chooses to create account during checkout
alternate_flows.item_1: Payment fails and customer selects alternative payment method
alternate_flows.item_2: Customer modifies shipping address during checkout

postconditions.item_0: Order is created in the system

item_1.business_value: Reduces purchase friction and supports industry best practices for checkout experience, directly improving conversion rates and meeting competitor standards

item_2.title: Omnichannel Order Tracking and Account Management
item_2.description: Customers can track their orders across all channels and manage their account information through a unified interface. The system provides real-time inventory updates and seamless integration between online and offline experiences.

preconditions.item_0: Customer has placed at least one order
preconditions.item_1: Order tracking system is integrated with logistics providers

main_flow.item_1: System displays order history and current order status
main_flow.item_2: Customer selects an order to view detailed tracking information
main_flow.item_4: Customer can modify account information or preferences
main_flow.item_5: Customer can view saved payment methods and addresses

alternate_flows.item_0: Customer receives order status notifications via email/SMS
alternate_flows.item_1: Customer updates delivery preferences for active order
alternate_flows.item_2: Customer cancels order within allowed time window

postconditions.item_0: Customer has current order status information
postconditions.item_1: Account information is updated if modifications were made

item_2.business_value: Meets user expectations for omnichannel experience and order transparency, improving customer satisfaction and reducing support inquiries

item_3.title: Product Reviews and Community Ratings
item_3.description: Customers can view, submit, and manage product reviews and ratings. The system implements a comprehensive review system that builds trust and provides social proof, following competitor best practices from community-driven marketplaces.

preconditions.item_0: Customer has purchased or viewed a product
preconditions.item_1: Review system is configured and active

main_flow.item_1: System displays existing reviews and average rating
main_flow.item_2: Customer selects to write a review
main_flow.item_3: Customer submits rating and written review
main_flow.item_5: Review is published after moderation (if required)
main_flow.item_6: Other customers can view the new review

alternate_flows.item_2: Customer finds reviews helpful and flags accordingly

postconditions.item_0: Product review is stored in system
postconditions.item_2: Review is visible to other customers (after moderation)

item_3.business_value: Implements community-driven features that build trust and engagement, following successful models from leading competitors while providing valuable user-generated content

item_4.title: Headless Commerce API Integration
item_4.description: Third-party systems and frontend applications can interact with the e-commerce platform through RESTful APIs to retrieve product information, process orders, and manage inventory. This supports headless commerce architecture adoption trends.

main_flow.item_0: Third-party application authenticates with API gateway
main_flow.item_2: API gateway validates credentials and routes request
main_flow.item_3: Backend services retrieve and format product data
main_flow.item_5: Third-party application displays data in custom interface

alternate_flows.item_0: Authentication fails and appropriate error is returned
alternate_flows.item_1: Requested product is out of stock and inventory status is provided
alternate_flows.item_2: Rate limiting is enforced for high-volume requests

postconditions.item_1: API usage is logged for analytics and billing
postconditions.item_2: System maintains data consistency across channels

item_4.business_value: Supports headless commerce architecture trend and enables flexible integration with various frontend experiences, positioning the platform for future scalability and omnichannel expansion

item_5.title: Sustainability-Focused Shopping Experience
item_5.description: Customers can identify and filter products based on sustainability criteria such as carbon footprint, eco-friendly materials, and ethical sourcing. The system provides transparent sustainability information aligned with growing consumer environmental consciousness.

main_flow.item_5: Customer makes purchase decision based on sustainability factors

alternate_flows.item_1: Customer views sustainability certifications and documentation
alternate_flows.item_2: Customer shares sustainability information on social platforms

item_5.business_value: Addresses sustainability-focused shopping trend and differentiates the platform in the market while meeting evolving consumer expectations for transparent environmental impact information

business_requirements.overview: E-commerce Platform v2 is a next-generation e-commerce solution designed to meet evolving industry standards and consumer expectations. The platform incorporates mobile-first design, AI-powered personalization, headless commerce architecture, and sustainability-focused features to compete with market leaders while ensuring regulatory compliance and optimal user experience.

business_goals.item_0: Increase mobile conversion rates by 25% through mobile-first optimization
business_goals.item_1: Improve customer retention by 20% with personalized experiences
business_goals.item_2: Achieve 99.9% uptime and sub-2-second page load times
business_goals.item_3: Expand to 5000+ products with real-time inventory management
business_goals.item_4: Comply with all applicable data privacy and payment security regulations
business_goals.item_5: Enable seamless omnichannel shopping experience across all touchpoints

success_criteria.item_0: Mobile traffic conversion rate increase of 25% within 6 months
success_criteria.item_1: Customer satisfaction score of 4.5+ out of 5.0
success_criteria.item_2: API response time under 200ms for 95% of requests
success_criteria.item_3: Zero security incidents or data breaches
success_criteria.item_5: 50% increase in repeat purchases within 12 months

constraints.item_0: Must comply with PCI DSS, GDPR, and CCPA regulations
constraints.item_2: Page load times must not exceed 2 seconds
constraints.item_3: All interfaces must meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards
constraints.item_4: Integration with existing ERP and inventory systems required
constraints.item_5: Budget cap of $2M for initial development and deployment

assumptions.item_0: Existing customer base will adopt new features with minimal training
assumptions.item_1: Third-party logistics providers will integrate with new tracking APIs
assumptions.item_2: Payment gateway providers will support required security standards
assumptions.item_3: Product suppliers will provide sustainability data as requested
assumptions.item_4: Development team will have access to necessary testing environments
assumptions.item_5: Marketing team will effectively communicate new features to users

item_0.risk: Security vulnerabilities could lead to data breaches
item_0.mitigation: Implement comprehensive security testing, regular audits, and real-time monitoring

item_1.risk: Performance issues during peak traffic periods
item_1.mitigation: Conduct load testing, implement auto-scaling, and use CDN for content delivery

item_2.mitigation: Develop comprehensive API layer and maintain detailed documentation

item_3.mitigation: Engage legal counsel early, implement compliance monitoring, and conduct regular audits
